desc: HACHI KOBAYASHI ― Original character; an odd, warm woman, with a strange disposition. A ghost walking. (2024)

OBSESSIVE VOW ― For Lunar Menagerie event Camp Solstice; A knight, pursuant of her princess. (2024)

Effigy by YawningYawns, which the design was based off. Graphic design by Heartmush.
FRUIT TART ― Original character; original design from 2014, reworked. The princess of sweets. (2024)
HORROR ― School assignment; design what "horror" looks like. (2023)
DECANTRY STYX ― For Lunar Menagerie event Decantry Styx; an assortment. (2022)
